summary: The story of legendary Guan Yu crossing five passes & slaying six generals. He played a major role in the civil war that led to the collapse of Han Dynasty & the establishment of Shu Han of the 3 Kingdoms, making Liu Bei its first emperor.
cast: Donnie Yen|Wen Jiang|Li Sun|Bing Shao|Edison Wang|Yong Dong|Andy On|Yuan Nie|Xuebing Wang|Zonghan Li|Ailei Yu|Alex Fong|Hong Chen|Siu-Ho Chin|Xiang Gao|Heizi|Ping Sang|Chris Tsui|Zhang Xi|Jiao Xiao-Yu|Hua Yan|Biao Yang|Xiao-Fei Yang|Sun Yin-Yin|Kang Yu|Ke Zhao|Pei-Gang Zhao|Yi-Peng Zheng|Bo Zhou
title: Guan yun chang
